#summary The a rel attribute represents the relation of the target resource to the current document.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [AElement <a> element] > *rel attribute*

== Usage ==

{{{
<a rel="feed" href="/atom.xml">subscribe</a>
}}}

== Values ==

See [LinkTypes link types] for the possible values of this attribute.

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
